name: Depth of Decay
description:
Do you like dungeon crawling, hack and slash, souls-like games? Me Too!!! Which is what i have tried to create with this short 1 level prototype, made during my time at university. 

While i have made models for the game (1 or 2 done using maya and zbrush) i counldnt have made this at the level it is without the following:

Infuse Studio - Environments "Medieval Dungeon" Pack (Found on Epic launcher marketplace)

Mixamo - Animations and Player/Enemy models

Free sound - For additional sound effects

__________________________________________________________________________________

I hope you find some enjoyment out of this short prototype.  

(This was a year 1 Project for my Uni course in Games Art and Design. my focus was purely code. There are most likely many issues with the game so expect bugs! Aside from that, Have some fun playing this Souls-like Prototype i made!)
